title: MBA A1465 11" Trackpad issue
message: I have this machine that the trackpad becomes unresponsive after an unspecific amount of time of idling unless I click the trackpad. Once I click the trackpad the pointer becomes responsive and functions normally. I dont have any extra trackpads laying around for this model that is why Im posting here first for advice.  Board looks like it has been cleaned before, maybe from possible previous damage but all in all the board looks good.

title: MBA A1465 11" Trackpad issue
message: Before anything else the cable and trackpad should be replaced. Also inspect connector for corrosion.
